presentation.title: Software Developer
presentation.description: I design and develop functional and aesthetically pleasing applications with passion and attention to detail. Focused on providing an exceptional user experience and ensuring the highest quality in every project.

about_me.title: About Me
about_me.description: I am a passionate software developer with experience in modern technologies. I love working on challenging projects and collaborating with creative teams to deliver innovative solutions. My focus is on creating impactful, high-quality digital experiences that improve people's lives.

additionalInfo.1: I am a developer with over a year of experience working on my own projects, focused on innovation and creative problem-solving.
additionalInfo.2: Graduated as a Computer Development Technologist from Universidad ECCI and currently a student of Software Engineering.
additionalInfo.3: Diploma in software development from Universidad del Bosque and MinTic.

jobs.description: Currently developing interactive dashboards that integrate artificial intelligence and automated agents, focused on providing attractive and functional interfaces to improve user experience and decision-making.

Freelance developer specializing in frontend and backend web solutions, including projects like Essence Atelier, Care&Life, Firseco and a generic store. Used React, JavaScript, Spring Boot, and Python, managing SQL and NoSQL databases.
Worked in the Networks and Telecommunications area as a customer service specialist, providing support and making sales. This experience strengthened my communication and problem-solving skills.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: I have worked on projects using Java, JavaScript, Spring Boot, HTML, CSS, Angular, React, and Python, among other technologies. My focus spans from web application development to backend logic, integrating both relational and non-relational databases to ensure quality and efficiency. Additionally, I have implemented solutions involving artificial intelligence and autonomous agents, applying these technologies to optimize processes, enhance user experience, and add strategic value to projects.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: I am available to consider any professional opportunities or collaboration proposals that may arise. If you have an idea you would like to discuss or share, feel free to contact me. I will be happy to respond promptly and explore how we can collaborate together.
